I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it quite a bit more by the end. "Les Valseuses" is all over the place to say the least as it was pretty funny, equally disturbing, captivating, interesting and a few different other words. No wonder "Les Valseuses" is rated 7.5 on Imdb.com.
